hero.desc: Built to grow with you — from note-taking to managing all aspects of your productive life.

features.title: Everything you need for organized thinking
features.desc: Powerful features designed to help you capture, organize, and retrieve your knowledge effortlessly.

1.title: Capture Notes Instantly
1.desc: Write down ideas, thoughts, and insights in a clean, distraction-free editor.

2.title: PARA Organization System
2.desc: Structure your knowledge using Projects, Areas, Resources, and Archives.

3.title: Smart Tagging
3.desc: Add multiple tags to your notes and filter them easily based on context.

4.title: Powerful Search
4.desc: Find notes by keywords, tags, type, or group — instantly.

5.title: Note Types & Labels
5.desc: Categorize notes as Ideas, Quotes, Insights, and more with visual icons.

6.title: Autosave & Version Safe
6.desc: Your thoughts are always saved automatically as you type.

7.title: Cross-Platform Access
7.desc: Access your knowledge base from anywhere — web or mobile.

8.title: Private & Secure
8.desc: All your notes are securely stored and only accessible to you.

para-method.title: The PARA Method
para-method.desc: Created by Tiago Forte, PARA is a simple yet powerful organizational system that mirrors how your brain naturally thinks.

1.title: Projects
1.desc: Things you're working on with a deadline and specific outcome. Active work that needs your attention.

2.title: Areas
2.desc: Ongoing responsibilities you want to manage over time. Standards you want to maintain in your life.

3.title: Resources
3.desc: Topics or interests that may be useful in the future. Your personal knowledge library.

4.title: Archive
4.desc: Inactive items from the other three categories. Keep your active workspace clean and focused.

comming-soon.title: Your Complete Productivity Suite
comming-soon.desc: We're building more than just a note-taking app. Get ready for integrated productivity tools.

1.title: Integrated Todo List
1.desc: Transform your project notes into actionable tasks. Create todo lists that automatically organize within your PARA structure, with smart due dates and priority management.

2.title: Time Tracking
2.desc: Track time spent on projects and areas directly from your notes. Get insights into your productivity patterns and optimize your workflow with detailed analytics.
